name: Matriarchs of the Marigold Relic
description: Hailing from Kharthâ€™s Daggers, the Matriarchs of the Marigold Relic are known for their strength, vitality, and good fortune. One of the few who witnessed the Osmerian Anomaly, and equipped with the knowledge of what may have actually happened, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
